cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.proxy

Class SimpleProxyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.proxy.SimpleProxyProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyProvider

    public class SimpleProxyProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProxyProvider
    A simple ProxyProvider. Provide proxy as round-robin without heartbeat and error check. It can be used when all proxies are stable.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    code4crafter@gmail.com Date: 17/4/16 Time: 10:18
